entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 22 at 7:42PM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The Saint Johns River at Sanford is forecast to slowly fall while remaining within Minor Flood Stage this week and through this weekend. Residents and interests along the river should expect a continuation of Minor flood impacts.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Seminole

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 2:37PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...POTENTIAL WINTER STORM THANKSGIVING DAY THROUGH FRIDAY... Forecast models have been trending more and more towards a winter storm impacting New Mexico Thanksgiving Day through Friday and into Friday night. At this time, mainly eastern and portions of central New Mexico would be affected but considerable uncertainty exists with the track and timing of this storm system.
